title: The Big Game
description: A TEXAS RANGER IS DRAWN INTO A SUPERNATURAL WAR AND BESTOWED WITH A THOUSAND YEAR LIFE SPAN AFTER DEFEATING A DEMON BEING PURSUED BY AN ANCIENT CHINESE WARRIOR. FOR OVER ONE HUNDRED YEARS THE GUNSLINGER AND THE MARTIAL ARTIST HAVE HUNTED THE CREATURES THAT SECRETLY WALK AMONG US. IF THESE TWO WARRIORS CAN KEEP FROM KILLING EACH OTHER, THEY JUST MAY SAVE HUMANITY ITSELF.
author: Shannon Eric Denton
